name: Bespoke Robusto
additionalNotes:
Filler: Long filler, grown with sun exposure,
a blend of Ligero, Seco, and Volado
(cultivo al sol)
Binder: shade grown (cultivo tapado)
Wrapper: Shade grown coarse cut, maduro fermented
Flavor: Aromatic, medium to strong
Draw: Excellent
Combustion: Excellent
Completely hand made by seasoned experts.
